subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The San Diego Chargers earned a trip to New England and the A.F.C. championship, but may have to play the Patriots without Philip Rivers and LaDainian Tomlinson.
snippet: The San Diego Chargers earned a trip to New England and the A.F.C. championship, but may have to play the Patriots without Philip Rivers and LaDainian Tomlinson.
